script: You will be given three messages from different people Peter Montgomery, Orlaigh Fannin, and Brian Magee.
Brian Magee: The time we will meet is when the moon is high.
Peter Montgomery: We will rendezvous where the trains are supplied.
Orlaigh Fannin: Bring to the meeting a quiet way to open locked doors.
Given the clandestine messages you have received, tell me as specifically as you can, when and where a meeting is going to happen and what you should bring.
